entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
